attributes.action: NMC to consider increasing the clubbing  period for IELTS and OET due to covid19
attributes.additional_details: Because NMC has no plans to consider my request
attributes.background: Government to make necessary orders to advise NMC to increase clubbing period

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about the accepted English language tests are the responsibility of the Nursing and Midwifery Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.
